resources.string:
How to use the application

Touch a fuel name in list of fuels to make it base and input the volume/mass into the text field on the top of the screen. For each fuel application will automatically count amount you should take to get the same amount of energy.

Tap arrow on the right of each fuel in the list to see more information about it. Use "delete" button to remove fuel from the list.

You can add new fuel by pressing "add fuel" button.

!!Warning!!

Pressing "Reset fuel list to default" button will delete all fuel types You added and fill the list with default fuel types.
